00022         class NOVTABLE CLogActivator :
00023                 public module::ComRootObject<>,
00024                 public IBundleActivator
00025         {
00026         public:
00027 
00028                 DECLARE_IMPLEMENTATION(CLogActivator)
00029 
00030                 BEGIN_INTERFACE_MAP()
00031                         INTERFACE_ENTRY(IBundleActivator)

00033 
00034                 virtual void Start(IBundleContext* context)
00035                 {
00036                         module::com_ptr<ILogService> log;
00037                         create_instance<CLogService, ILogService>(log);
00038                         context->RegisterService(uuid_of(ILogService), log);
00039                 }
00040

00042                 {
00043                 }
